channel.description: Recent content in WSTG-V42-CONF-08 on ZAP

item.title: Cross-Domain Misconfiguration - Adobe - Read
item.description: Flash/Silverlight based cross-site request forgery may be possible, due to a misconfiguration on the web server.

item.title: Cross-Domain Misconfiguration - Adobe - Send
item.description: Flash/Silverlight based cross-site request forgery may be possible, due to a misconfiguration on the web server.

item.title: Cross-Domain Misconfiguration - Silverlight
item.description: Silverlight based cross-site request forgery may be possible, due to a misconfiguration on the web server.
